## ICredentialWallet.findNonRevokedCredential() method

Finds non-revoked credential from a given list by resolving their credential status

**Signature:**

```typescript
findNonRevokedCredential(creds: W3CCredential[]): Promise<{
        cred: W3CCredential;
        revStatus: RevocationStatus;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  creds | [W3CCredential](./js-sdk.w3ccredential.md)\[\] |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ cred: [W3CCredential](./js-sdk.w3ccredential.md); revStatus: [RevocationStatus](./js-sdk.revocationstatus.md); }&gt;

`{Promise<{ cred: W3CCredential; revStatus: RevocationStatus; }>` not revoked credential and it's revocation status
